text: Mason City is a city in Iowa in the United States. It is the county seat of Cerro Gordo County. On February 3, 1959, a Beechcraft Bonanza 35 airplane carrying Buddy Holly, Ritchie Valens, J.P. "The Big Bopper" Richardson and the pilot Roger Peterson, crashed into a field near Mason City. Singer Don McLean's popular 1971 song "American Pie" made this event and February 3 known as "The Day the Music Died." Category:Cities in Iowa Category:County seats in Iowa
title: Mason City, Iowa
